channel.title: Help with adding portals please.(317)
channel.description: I know how to add portals, i just need to know how to add 2 portals that go to seperate places. When i make 2 portals now, they both lead the the same place.......somone please help?

item.title: Help with adding portals please.(317)
item.dc:creator: @life_lover7 life lover7
item.description:
@life_lover7 wrote:

[quote=“syracusepker94, post:6, topic:314510”]client.java
search

makeglobalobject

add a portal
(search the id of that portal in your client.java first to make sure if its not already in use)

then search

objectID ==

and add

if(objectID == ####){
sM("optional");
triggerTele2(####+misc.random(#), ####+misc.random(#), 0);
}

the

 +misc.random(#)

is optional as well
what this does is tell the game that

if you click on object ####
tele to X-coord(+random offset),Y coord(+random offset), height[/quote]

The portal ID i’m using is already in use…that’s my problem…i Think…can somone help me?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with adding portals please.(317)
item.dc:creator: @syracusepker94 syracusepker94
item.description:
@syracusepker94 wrote:

client.java
search

makeglobalobject

add a portal
(search the id of that portal in your client.java first to make sure if its not already in use)

then search

objectID ==

and add

if(objectID == ####){
sM("optional");
triggerTele2(####+misc.random(#), ####+misc.random(#), 0);
}

the

 +misc.random(#)

is optional as well
what this does is tell the game that

if you click on object ####
tele to X-coord(+random offset),Y coord(+random offset), height

Read full topic

item.title: Help with adding portals please.(317)
item.dc:creator: @life_lover7 life lover7
item.description:
@life_lover7 wrote:

I did make 2 portals and 2 if statment containing the same portal id. Both portals lead to the first if statment. I wana know how to make it where each portal goes to a different if statment.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with adding portals please.(317)
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

do a makeglobalobject for each.

Then make an if statement containing the portal id. toX and toY and your done. If you need to, I can go into more detail.

Read full topic
